Baytown.Lynchburg, Texas:
Lynchburg (also known as Lynch's Ferry) is an unincorporated community in east central Harris County, Texas, United States.


== History ==
In 1822, Nathaniel Lynch built a ferry to cross the San Jacinto River just below where Buffalo Bayou flows into it. The ferry connected what would become the community of Lynchburg, on the east side of the crossing with the road to Harrisburg.
